department: Public Works and Government Services Canada
short_summary: Gwaii Haanas II drydocking and refit
description: The Contracting Authority is seeking a contractor who will, inter alia, fulfill the requirements of the statement of work and corresponding specifications as detailed in Annex A of the bid solicitation. bidder is required to carry out the list of services included in Annex A. Work must begin on February 13, 2023, and conclude not later than April 14, 2023.
full_summary:
### MV Gwaii Haanas II Refit Tender Announcement (Request for Proposal)

**Reference Number:** PW-XLV-176-8412
**Amendment Number:** 1
**Solicitation Number:** 5P438-220139/A
**Publication Date:** January 27, 2023
**Tender Closing Date:** February 15, 2023 (17:00:00)

**Summary:**

Public Works and Government Services Canada hereby invites bids for the refit of the MV Gwaii Haanas II in accordance with the Statement of Work (Annex A) and technical specifications. The refit will be carried out at a drydocking facility in Western Canada.

**Tender Process:**

This procurement is conducted under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA). All interested suppliers may submit a bid. The competitive procurement strategy is based on the lowest/lowest bid methodology.

**Key Dates:**

* Work Period: Commence on February 13, 2023 and complete by April 14, 2023.
* Bid Submission: February 15, 2023 (17:00:00).

**Additional Information:**

* Parks Canada is the end-user entity.
* The contract will be awarded to the supplier who submits the lowest bid that meets the requirements specified in the solicitation documents.
* The Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.

**Required Documents:**

The bid solicitation documents, including the Statement of Work (Annex A) and technical specifications, are available on Canadabuys (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/26/a5cad7a5122ccc8a9aab405bc19116d6/ABES.PROD.PW_XLV.B176.E8412.EBSU000.PDF).

**Suppliers' Eligibility:**

Suppliers must be located in the Area of Origin of the vessel (Western Canada) in accordance with the PWGSC Supply Manual Article 3.170.10(b).

**Optional Activities:**

* Optional Bidders' Conference
* Optional Site Visit
* Bid Submission

**Notice and Solicitation Documents:**

The procurement notice and solicitation documents are available on Canadabuys (https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/26/4f80fa163e23607efb7a59813ce0750d/
